item.title: Dockerizing Pligg with Fig
item.description: For a pet project I needed Pligg which is kinda a social network site in the style of the old-digg (with karma and this kind of things). Installing a LAMP system is kinda boring stuff, so, for that and for the sake of learning I decided to go with Docker & Fig. Sadly or luckily, every time that I dockerize something I find a lot of unexpected problems that slow me down, but… you always learn something!
